title: Assistant Scientist Zac Skin
body: Could we have a new Zac skin? I thought "assistant scientist" would fit him seeing as his parents were scientists. He could have a ripped lab coat and glasses resembling goggles or Raybands and thats all you'd need. For his passive, his clothes could drop down and go back to him with green spots if he manages to revive. I don't have any splash art for this though.

replies.body: heh heh sounds not bad indeed also {{champion:432}} is fat
Indeed he is. Indeed he is.
mad scientist singed + assistant scientist zac yeah?
